comment: Version of ~ equsal with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . See ~ equsalvw for a version with two disjoint variable conditions requiring fewer axioms. See also the dual form ~ equsexv . (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.)
